author: AJ

review: Having used this for a year and a half I can't recomend it.  When it works it works great (for Netflix and Youtube, not really anything else) however, it stops working very frequently.  It seems to be software/firmware problems.  I can't even count how many times I 've paused my life and had to play reboot everything games trying to get the chromecast to work. The chromecast is on our network, showing it's rotating screensaver pictures so I know it's working, my laptop/phone is on the network, but the two just don't see each other.  Or the times where I've started playing something then need to pause or want to change programs and they've completely lost sync.  I assumed this was a temporary isssue, but, a year and a half later it's still awful.
author: T. Robertson

review: I order the chrome cast because one of my family members had one. It was very convenient to use and easy to install. However, the sounds wasn't working on there last night so I need to find out why.
